ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The American Association Research (AACR) Project Genomics Evidence Neoplasia Information Exchange (GENIE) BioPharma Collaborative represents a multi-year, multi-institution effort to build a pan-cancer repository of linked clinico-genomic data. The genomic and clinical data are provided in multiple releases (separate releases for each cancer cohort with updates following data corrections), which are stored on the data sharing platform 'Synapse' <https://www.synapse.org/>. The 'genieBPC' package provides a seamless way to obtain the data corresponding to each release from 'Synapse' and to prepare datasets for analysis.

The American Association Research (AACR) Project Genomics Evidence Neoplasia Information Exchange (GENIE) BioPharma Collaborative represents a multi-year, multi-institution effort to build a pan-cancer repository of linked clinico-genomic data. The genomic and clinical data are provided in multiple releases (separate releases for each cancer cohort with updates following data corrections), which are stored on the data sharing platform 'Synapse' <https://www.synapse.org/>. The 'genieBPC' package provides a seamless way to obtain the data corresponding to each release from 'Synapse' and to prepare datasets for analysis.

name: r-geniebpc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-geniebpc
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/genieBPC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/genieBPC/genieBPC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4f9e47a8c110fb0175ad5795a5dcbc266bf576d2508451c437b65d8989504e0a

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli >=2.5.0
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.6
    - r-dtplyr >=1.1.0
    - r-httr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-purrr >=0.3.4
    - r-rlang >=1.0.0
    - r-stringr >=1.4.0
    - r-sunburstr
    - r-tibble >=3.1.2
    - r-tidyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli >=2.5.0
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.6
    - r-dtplyr >=1.1.0
    - r-httr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-purrr >=0.3.4
    - r-rlang >=1.0.0
    - r-stringr >=1.4.0
    - r-sunburstr
    - r-tibble >=3.1.2
    - r-tidyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('genieBPC')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('genieBPC')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://genie-bpc.github.io/genieBPC/
  license: MIT
  summary: The American Association Research (AACR) Project Genomics Evidence Neoplasia Information Exchange (GENIE) BioPharma Collaborative represents a multi-year, multi-institution effort to build a pan-cancer repository of linked clinico-genomic data. The genomic and clinical data are provided in multiple releases (separate
    releases for each cancer cohort with updates following data corrections), which are stored on the data sharing platform 'Synapse' <https://www.synapse.org/>. The 'genieBPC' package provides a seamless way to obtain the data corresponding to each release from 'Synapse' and to prepare datasets for analysis.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
